<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Poisoner Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2036) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 186 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful. You gain the [basic alchemy benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1435), though they can be used only for [alchemical poisons](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons). You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level. Your advanced alchemy level for creating these is 1 and doesn't increase on its own.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained at least two other feats from the poisoner archetype.

<title level="2">Poisoner Dedication leads to...</title>
[Acquired Tolerance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2040), [Expert Poisoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2038), [Poison Coat](/Feats.aspx?ID=2039), [Poisoner's Twist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2037)
name: Poisoner Dedication
